subdisciplines.name: Neurochemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the chemicals and chemical processes that occur in the brain and nervous system.

subdisciplines.name: Neurogenetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of how genes and genetic variations contribute to neurological and psychiatric disorders.

subdisciplines.name: Neuropharmacology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the effects of drugs on the nervous system and how these drugs can be used to treat neurological disorders.

subdisciplines.name: Neurophysiology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the functions and activities of the nervous system, including the brain, nerves, and muscles.
